title: e-Learning-Based Science Competency Performance Assessment Design: Applying the 4C/ID Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science theories and experience with e-learning platforms
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen the ability to solve realistic scientific tasks in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate competence in designing and analyzing scientific experiments through realistic tasks based on the 4C/ID model.
Learners improve performance outcomes by utilizing a formative feedback system, including peer assessment, on e-learning platforms.
Learners systematically document scientific problem-solving processes using assessment tools optimized for mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
